abstract: Nicole P Eramo, associate dean at the University of Virginia, files defemation lawsuit against Rolling Stone magazine, saying publication portrayed her as 'chief villain' in discredited article about gang rape on campus.
lead_paragraph: An associate dean at the University of Virginia is suing the article’s author, as well as Rolling Stone magazine and its parent company, for a total of nearly $8 million in damages.

headline.main: Rolling Stone Rape Article Results in Defamation Suit
headline.print_headline: Rolling Stone Rape Article Results in Defamation Suit

snippet: An associate dean at the University of Virginia is suing the article’s author, as well as Rolling Stone magazine and its parent company, for a total of nearly $8 million in damages.
